text:
Update of junit-frames.xsl to get separate lists of failures and errors.

I created a patch for junit-frames.xsl (against CVS HEAD) that adds
special pages for failures only (and errors only). These special pages
are report-wide and class-specific. You can always get to this page by
clicking on the number of errors or failures. Report-wide flat list of
tests has been added too.

This whole change is tested.

Please review it and commit it if you want.

Note: already sent to mailing list, see:
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/ant-dev/200508.mbox/%3c1123764142.7021.18.camel@localhost.localdomain%3e
creator: jan.mynarik@systinet.com
jan.mynarik@systinet.com
text:
Created attachment 16082
Patch adding special pages for errors and failures only

The actual patch.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
changes applied to CVS_HEAD, thank you!

incidentally, it would be nice to have the overview page link to these two pages...

Actually, links are there. Click on the test/failure/error numbers in
overview-summary.html page :-) Probably not that visible though.
creator: jan.mynarik@systinet.com
